EmailTemplate.name: Columbia Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Columbia, SC - February 26
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Columbia Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Thursday, February 26, 2015 at:
Location: Courtyard Columbia Downtown at USC 630 Assembly Street Columbia, SC 29201 (803) 799-7800
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Columbia Downtown at USC, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/caecd-courtyard-columbia-downtown-at-usc/> or call the hotel directly at (803) 799-7800. vAuto, Inc., 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181
Contact Us <#>
